metadata.description: A ReplicationGroup can send event notifications to an AWS SNS Topic. ElastiCache publishes cluster events (e.g., failovers, node additions/removals, parameter group changes) to the specified SNS topic, enabling downstream subscribers to react to infrastructure state changes.

patch.description: The ReplicationGroup holds the SNS Topic ARN to route ElastiCache event notifications.
The SNS Topic receives ElastiCache event notifications from the ReplicationGroup.
